title: (x) Yale Wedgish Serif - Yale (custom by Matthew Carter) {Chris H}
content:
These letters are from the Yale University School of Medicine logo. I pulled out the most distinctive glyphs (characteristic characters?) for viewing here in TP.

I can't get a vector version of their logo for a sponsorship. I've got a huge gif, and, at its size, would work fine, but it's not anti-aliased, as you can see in the extraction.

FYI, I already ran this through WTF in various ways, to no avail.

Thanks in advance!

Ray

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022211101im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Yale-School-of-Medicine_5856.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022211101im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Yale-School-of-Medicine-full_5569.png)
author: microspective

comments.content:
\*Sigh\*

I fool so feelish. And I thought I was being resourceful...

Thank you.
